title: How to Make Pempek Panggang

steps.headline: Prepare all the Ingredients and the utensils which are needed.
Put the mackerel fish into the big bowl.
Add the salt into the big bowl.
Add up the sugar into the bowl.
Put the water into the bowl.
Add the sago flour into it.
Mix it all together until it's mixed well.
steps.description: You can mix it with the mixing stir, or you can use your own hand. But remember to wash you hand before mixing it.

steps.headline: Shape the dough into a slim ball shape
Grill it on the teflon.
steps.description: You can just grill it on the griller if you have it.

steps.headline: Move the grilled pempek panggang to the other side, so it will be grilled nicely.
steps.description: Don't use you hand, it's hot. you better use metal barbecue tongs.

steps.headline: After it has been cooked, take pempek panggang to the cutting board.
Cut it in the middle but do not make it become a separate half.
Fill the fillings inside it.
steps.description: You can choose which fillings you want to fill or you can just fill it all with all the fillings. it is up to you.

steps.headline: Finally, pempek panggang is ready to be served.

text: Prepare all the Ingredients and the utensils which are needed.  Put the mackerel fish into the big bowl.  Add the salt into the big bowl.  Add up the sugar into the bowl.  Put the water into the bowl.  Add the sago flour into it.  Mix it all together until it's mixed well. You can mix it with the mixing stir, or you can use your own hand. But remember to wash you hand before mixing it. Shape the dough into a slim ball shape  Grill it on the teflon. You can just grill it on the griller if you have it. Move the grilled pempek panggang to the other side, so it will be grilled nicely. Don't use you hand, it's hot. you better use metal barbecue tongs. After it has been cooked, take pempek panggang to the cutting board.  Cut it in the middle but do not make it become a separate half.  Fill the fillings inside it. You can choose which fillings you want to fill or you can just fill it all with all the fillings. it is up to you. Finally, pempek panggang is ready to be served.
